titleInfo.title: Map of a reconnaissance of the Mississippi River from Cairo, Ill's. to New Orleans, La. To accompany the report on that portion of the third subdivision of the Mississippi route to the seaboard made in accordance with an Act of Congress approved June 23rd, 1874

name.namePart: United States. Army. Corps of Engineers.

mods.note: On cover: Survey of the Mississippi River, Jos. R. Pursell, California, O.; The map, "Map of a reconnaissance of the Mississippi River from Cairo, Ill's. to New Orleans, La. To accompany the report on that portion of the third subdivision of the Mississippi route to the seaboard made in accordance with an Act of Congress approved June 23rd, 1874, by Charles R. Suter," is comprised of 31 maps providing details of the Mississippi River channel and some aspects of the flora along its banks.
mods.accessCondition: Please submit an LSU Special Collections reference ticket at https://askus.lib.lsu.edu/special for any questions or comments about this digital object.
mods.note: Army Corps of Engineers Mississippi River Map and Photographs, Mss. 4966, Louisiana and Lower Mississippi Valley Collections, LSU Libraries, Baton Rouge, La

recordInfo.recordOrigin: Transformed into MODS from extended Dublin Core by the LDL Development Team at Louisiana State University.
